name: CryptoDaily
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your coin telegraph. Plugs right into the latest rss feeds. In general this is a great way to stay up to date on crypto news. No shilling, only fud. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alex, Crypto news briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Skill requests are not shared with me (developer), and generates no income. Just a fan app.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
